venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
All,

We will NOT be formally meeting this month (9/27) at the NERD center, partly due to the lack of speakers and because the Boston PHP group already has an event scheduled the same evening at NERD. We would recommend you attend & support their event, but unfortunately it's completely full.

In lieu of presentations, join us for drinks at the Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant at 7pm on Mass Ave, about 1 mile from Microsoft. These social events are a great chance to pick people's brains, learn about what others are working on, and grow your social network.

See you there.
-James & Kurt
item.name: BWPM Sep 2010: Food & Drinks
